html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05512020-08-10,  ,  ,  ,  CIRNAC
ActTerritorial Lands Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Nunavut Mining Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the NUNAVUT MINING REGULATIONS in order to (1) waive the requirement to pay the annual rent for a mineral lease in Nunavut that becomes due, and has not yet been paid, during the one-year period from March 13, 2020 to March 12, 2021 if the lessee requests a waiver; (2) waive the rent on a request basis made either before the end of the duration of the claim or before March 13, 2021; and (3) waive the same amount of the rent that becomes due the following year if the rent requested to be waived has been paid.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0174 Publication Date: 2020-08-19
AttachmentsAttachment
